text: A'Takamul International School is a private school in Kuwait, based on the American cirriculum in Kuwait. The school is approved by the country's Ministry of Education and it aims to provide the students with global education, combining Arab and Western culture. == References == ==External links== *Welcome to A'Takamul International School - Kuwait Welcome to A'Takamul International School - Kuwait A'takamul International School School website Category:American international schools in Kuwait Category:Private schools in Kuwait
title: A'takamul International School
